title: New Blue Essence System and ARAM skin boost

embed.description: This preseason, we're combining runes and masteries into a single, streamlined system that you can use to adapt and customize your playstyle in champ select. We're removing the level 30 cap, and the new cap is... infinity! We're also replacing the IP grind with a revamped rewards system that levels up with you.

body: So one thing I'm curious about is if the skin boost on ARAM is going to stay the same. They're changing how much Blue essence is worth comparatively to RP. So will it stay that you can pay 100 RP for a skin boost and get 200 Blue essence (100 for your teammates)?

replies.body:
I'm not actually entirely sure about this to be quite honest! I'm reaching out to a few people, and I should have a definite answer by tomorrow. If I haven't responded yet, feel free to pester me ^_^

....just not too much xP
